responseId.description: The id of this poll response.

pollId.description: The id of the poll to which this response belongs to.

address.description: The address of the respondent. Used for crediting respondents for confirmed responses.

timestamp.description: the hash of the previous block on the chain

signature.description: The signature of the respondent to signify that it is them who made this response.

responseData.description: An array of responses to a poll question.
